text: Guandu is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is R25. == Station layout information == The station platforms are at ground level. Platform 1 is for Tamsui and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan. This is the last station at ground level on the line to Xiangshan. Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Guandu metro station
